detaileddescription.para: flag true callback ccl if stops

Maps a UnitVoiceGroup to a CSound*.
Compute a suitable volume for something taking place at a given distance from the current view point.

memberdef.argsstring: (bool isVolume, int power, unsigned char range)
memberdef.name: CalculateVolume

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the volume associated with a request, either by clipping the range parameter of this request, or by mapping this range to a volume.
Calculate the stereo value for a unit
Ask to the sound server to play a sound attached to a unit. The sound server may discard the sound if needed (e.g., when the same unit is already speaking).
Ask to the sound server to play a sound attached to a unit. The sound server may discard the sound if needed (e.g., when the same unit is already speaking).
Ask the sound server to play a sound for a missile.

parameterdescription.para: Volume level to play the sound
Filename of a sound to play

simplesect.para: Channel number the sound is playing on, -1 for error

detaileddescription.para: Ask the sound server to change the range of a sound.

the new range for this sound.

briefdescription.para: Register a sound (can be a simple sound or a group)

detaileddescription.para: Ask the sound server to register a sound (and currently to load it) and to return an unique identifier for it. The unique identifier is memory pointer of the server.
